resp = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "date": "2015-10-01T00:30:00Z"
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="2",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "date": "2015-10-01T01:30:00Z"
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    size="0",
    aggs={
        "by_day": {
            "date_histogram": {
                "field": "date",
                "calendar_interval": "day"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
